p: DNA from individual mosquitoes was extracted by a Chelex procedure proteinase-K-based extraction ( 16) using the protocol provided by the manufacturer. We used eight primers developed for Cx. pipiens ( 4, 17â€“ 19) (CQ13, CQ29, CxpGT9, CxpGT20, CxpGT40, CxpGT46, CxpGT51, and CxpGT53) and followed the PCR-protocols given in the original paper. The PCR-products were run on a MegaBase using dyed primers.
